name: Blorange is mucked borand GAM
description:
This is a game where you play as a mouse and avoid the Blorand army(not orange colored and they aren't called the orange army) and they are borand(not bad) with a pinch of muck in them.

They kill you if you touch them and plus, they taste horibble(thats why we call them the blorange army, not the orange army).

Built with powerpoint(this is why the game engine is trying to kill you as a mouse)
